articles.title: Here's how to schedule a COVID-19 vaccine appointment in Pennsylvania - FOX43.com
articles.description: The PA Department of Health has added more groups of people to phase 1A of the vaccine rollout, making 3.5 million Pennsylvanians eligible for the shot.
articles.content:

articles.author: Erin Allday
articles.title: The coronavirus is changing faster than scientists thought. Can vaccines still stamp it out? - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: The coronavirus is mutating faster than scientists thought, and some strains might be more infectious or able to evade vaccines. So the race is on to stamp out the virus.

articles.title: Explainer: COVID-19 vaccine shots add to confusion over China's tests for travelers - Reuters
articles.description: A coronavirus antibody test that China has made mandatory for arriving travelers has provoked concerns over its effectiveness after one of a team of international health experts was briefly denied entry last week following a positive result.
